title: CookiezzNZ - Diamond Stream - Mid Lane - RP GIveaway - Loyalty Rewards!
body:
Hey guys,

I am currently live and have a little channel announcement for my stream!

I just recently added in a loyalty system for giveaway raffles, but a viewer suggested a fairly good idea to be able to redeem the coins for prizes. 

So I have added this and now after you have X amount of coins you can redeem them for Mystery Gifts, Skins, Champions or anything with RP. Coin costs are on my Twitch channel.

I Also still have $10 of RP to giveaway during today so feel free to drop by! I also have my DJ Sona Giveaway on her release so get in there and start earning Coins for entries into that giveaway!

Thanks for reading and make sure to share this around!
